statements: UPDATE students SET student_name='John Doe', grade='A' WHERE student_id=1;
UPDATE students SET course_id=101, course_name='Mathematics' WHERE student_name='Jane Smith';
UPDATE students SET grade = 'A+' WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE students SET course_id = 101, course_name = 'Mathematics' WHERE student_id = 2;
UPDATE students SET student_age = 21, student_major = 'Computer Science' WHERE student_id = 1001;
UPDATE courses SET course_description = 'Introduction to Biology', course_credit_hours = 3 WHERE course_id = 2001;
UPDATE students SET student_major = 'Computer Science', student_age = 21 WHERE student_id = 101;
UPDATE courses SET course_credit_hours = 4, course_description = 'Advanced Programming Concepts' WHERE course_id = 201;
UPDATE Students SET grade_level = 10 WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE Courses SET instructor = 'Professor Johnson' WHERE course_id = 3;
UPDATE Students SET age = 20, grade_level = 11 WHERE student_id = 5;
UPDATE Grades SET grade = 85, grade_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE student_id = 3 AND course_id = 2;
UPDATE Students SET student_name='Alice', admission_year=2020 WHERE student_id=101;
UPDATE Courses SET credit_hours=4 WHERE course_id=201;
UPDATE Students SET student_name = 'Alice Smith', student_email = 'alice.smith@example.com' WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE Enrollments SET enrollment_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE enrollment_id = 3;
UPDATE Students SET grade = 12 WHERE student_id = 1;

UPDATE Students SET grade = 10 WHERE student_id = 1;
